task.summary: imported into IntelliJ. libaries should be added now
added some tests for halfedges added task 3 a), vertex-normals
added non-working laplace-filter, use it with 'S'
added non-working methods note: too many triangles. taking hours at HalfEdgeTriangleMesh line 65
almost working! need to fix: superQuadratic
small change in monomialCurve, still not being drawn
added hermiteCurve, added interpolation on monomial, added tangetials on both. still not correct

- added classes from Prof. Jenke - added raytracing without shadows - added colour param to sphere and floor - changed floor to not being a box - added possibility to add new lightsources (you need at least 1 though), also this works only at rendering with raytracing, the "live-rendering" only uses the first source - lights can have colours, but its not implemented to "adapt" the colour of objects - has a clipping bug - comments!
- added shadows now, but adding extra lightsources tend to f*ck up the diffuse lightning, better stay at 1. - specular lightning now supports the colour of the light
- added support for coloured lights - added some tests - bug: when 2 or more light-source are more or less opposite of each other, the diffuse-light "shadows" are crippled - added some getters
- added some comments - deleted unnecessary functions

MESSAGE.value: imported into IntelliJ. libaries should be added now

added hermiteCurve, added interpolation on monomial, added tangetials on both. still not correct

- added classes from Prof. Jenke - added raytracing without shadows - added colour param to sphere and floor - changed floor to not being a box - added possibility to add new lightsources (you need at least 1 though), also this works only at rendering with raytracing, the "live-rendering" only uses the first source - lights can have colours, but its not implemented to "adapt" the colour of objects - has a clipping bug

- added classes from Prof. Jenke - added raytracing without shadows - added colour param to sphere and floor - changed floor to not being a box - added possibility to add new lightsources (you need at least 1 though), also this works only at rendering with raytracing, the "live-rendering" only uses the first source - lights can have colours, but its not implemented to "adapt" the colour of objects - has a clipping bug - comments!
- added shadows now, but adding extra lightsources tend to f*ck up the diffuse lightning, better stay at 1. - specular lightning now supports the colour of the light
- added support for coloured lights - added some tests - bug: when 2 or more light-source are more or less opposite of each other, the diffuse-light "shadows" are crippled - added some getters
- added some comments - deleted unnecessary functions
